title: How many compounds are there in the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a rather funny question. As we know chemistry is an expanding field and hence new compounds are created to make everyday life easier. Theoretically, there are an infinite possible combinations of elements to form compounds and hence this question cannot be answered figuratively. Large no. Of compounds have been made, is made and will continue to be made and hence a figurative answer is impossible. The answer to your question would be infinity or uncountable

The exact number of compounds can’t be determine anymore because everyday new compounds are created especially in the field of organic chemistry. There are only a few letters of the alphabet yet when combined form thousands of words. In like manner,millions of compounds are formed using a a hundred elements and compounds also are created by mixing two or more compounds .
